post.body: So i just set up this zeroID after loosing my old one.  Not sure why.  It was after the update but it was working immediately after.  Just reset today.  To be honest, i dont even know where the conneted site files are stored.   Any help?  Or is there any basic how to's or faq's out there?

When trying to follow another user...
 "Internal error: TypeError: actionMergerSiteAdd() takes exactly 3 arguments (2 given)
UiWebsocket.py line 98 > UiWebsocket.py line 175"

Can anyone check this for me?
http://127.0.0.1:43110/13J4xKyutC2qQuukZymgBNpZUsVbo2oouF/

Do any dev folks check this:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj/ZeroNet+help+FAQ
I assume its the 'official' help / faq.  Is there another?
(Kaffie - This is the official help/faq cloned onto zeronet: http://127.0.0.1:43110/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/)

Can some one check my zerotalk clone (again).  /13J4xKyutC2qQuukZymgBNpZUsVbo2oouF/
I think i got it working... I hope.

comment.body: Its a zerotalk clone.  I can see it.  But can everyone?
huh... when i click it i see a functional zerotalk site with a couple treads i started. Any idea on why that would be?  I run lubuntu.
arg....  my dashboard says 2 peers now (was 11 last night), and im currently viewing the site.  What can make it so im only hosting the site but not peering it?

so when i try to view through a proxy it gets stuck on
" Connecting...
Peers found: 2
content.json download failed"
also got "504 Gateway Time-out"
Just a thought, does it have to do with permissions?  Or the location of my zerobundle folder?
Ok. pulled out the right sidebar and re-signed and published.  I think that did the trick.  I can now view the zite through the proxies.  It would be nice if someone could double check it thought.
